nodes.bodyText: I think I'd prefer a dedicated test for this, just so that it doesn't get accidentally removed and the behavior reverted in the future, could you add a test for this? (it can basically be a copy of this test with a descriptive name)
Good suggestion, made a separate test case for it !
Calling this "apply" I think is a little misleading, I think normalizeRequestSettings would be a better name for this method
